# GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Primary Rule
Follow the rules and guidelines defined in [`AGENTS.md`](../AGENTS.md).

## Quick Reference
- **TDD Workflow**: Write tests first (Red → Green → Refactor)
- **TypeScript Only**: Strict ESM and TypeScript
- **API-First**: Every MQTT feature needs a REST API endpoint
- **Source of Truth**: Check `ARCHITECTURE.md` for technical design decisions

See [`AGENTS.md`](../AGENTS.md) for complete details.
